item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello, World! My name is Stas. I am a seasoned technologist with over 15 years of experience in software engineering, solution architecture and engineering management. I’m currently holding a position of Senior Solution Architect at EPAM Systems focusing on strategic technical consulting and solutions for enterprise and direct-to-consumer products. In simple English, I do apps for mobile, connected devices and Smart TVs üôÇÔ∏è. Feel free to checkout my resume if you want to learn more about my professional occupations.
